name: Combobox
description: A searchable dropdown component with filtering, multiple selection, tags, and creatable options

accessibility.screenReader: Input announces autocomplete and expanded state. Options announced with position. Tags announced with remove instructions.

recommendedUsage: Use for searchable selection with many options. Use multiple mode for tag-based multi-selection.
antiPatterns: Do not use for small lists without search needs - use Select instead. Avoid complex option content.
